verses.text: A Jehová, Dios Axonhejochi, a ix loloni. Ix yavtej eb' cajan d'a yolyib'anhq'uinal tic, b'aj sjavi k'u masanto b'aj tz'em k'u.
A d'a tzalan Sion, aton chonhab' te vach' yilji, ata' sch'ox saquilq'uinal Dios.
Tic sja co Diosal, palta manh ichnhejoctalaj ol javoc. A d'a spatic yichanh ay jun k'ak' to satumeli yed' jun chacxuxum ik'.
Ato d'a chaanh tz'avtaj eb' aj satchaanh yed' eb' cajan d'a sat lum luum tic yuj Dios, yic vach' syil eb' sch'olb'itaj schonhab'.
Syal Dios icha tic: Molb'ejec e b'a ex vicxo, a ex eyak'nac jun silab' d'ayin, ayic eyak'annac e trato ved'oc, xchi.
A satchaanh sch'oxani to a Dios Juez ton d'a stojolal.
Syalanpax Dios icha tic: Ex in chonhab' Israel, ab'ecnab'i, jichan ol vutej valanoch e paltail d'a e sat. A in Dios in, e Diosal in.
Maj ex in tumejlaj yuj eyofrenda tzeyak'taxon d'ayin yed' nok' nok' tze nhus silab'il d'ayin d'a valtar.
Max in k'anlaj nok' quelemtac vacax molb'il eyuuj. Malaj nok' mam chiva d'a yol e macte' tzin k'an d'ayex.
Vicnhej masanil nok' caltacte'al nok', vic pax nok' molb'etzal nok' ay d'a jolomtac vitz.
Vic masanil nok' much ay d'a caltac te' yed' masanil tas tz'ek' d'a cal vayumtac.
Q'uinaloc ay in vejel, manh ol val-laj d'ayex, yujto vic jun yolyib'anhq'uinal tic yed' masanil tas ay d'ay.
¿Tocval a sb'ak'chil nok' vacax tzin chi'a? ¿Tocval a pax schiq'uil nok' mam chiva svuq'uej?
A silab' tzin nib'ej, to tzeyak' yuj diosal d'ayin, tzeyaq'uelk'och tas tzeyaltej d'ayin, a in ton ek' in to d'a yib'anh smasanil.
Ayic ay eyaelal, avtejinec, ol ex in colo', a exxo ol in eyik'chaanh, xchi Dios.
Axo d'a eb' chuc sb'eyb'al, syal Dios icha tic: ¿Toc ay eyalan eyic eyalanel in k'ayb'ub'al, ma eyalanel yab'ixal in trato?
Ina to max yal-laj e k'ool tzex in cacha', malaj yelk'och in lolonel d'ayex.
Ayic sja vinh elk'umtaxoni, tzex q'ue urnaj e b'at yed' vinh. Te vach' eyak'anpax yed' eb' sk'ulan ajmulal.
Palta a tas tze k'ulej, to tze naq'ue lolonel, max ex och vaan eyesani.
A d'a eb' eyuk'tac junnhej e nun yed'oc, tzeyal chucal lolonel d'a spatic eb'.
Ayic ix e k'ulan juntzanh chucal tic, malaj tas svala'. Yuj chi' tze na' to lajan in eyed'oc, palta ol valoch e mul chi' d'a e sat, ol vil-lajoch in sat eyed'oc.
A ex tzin b'at satk'olal eyuuj tic, vach'ocab' tz'aj snachajel jun tic eyuuj, axo talaj tz'aji, ol ex in jatchitejb'ati, manhxalaj mach ol ex colan d'ayin.
A mach tz'ak'an yuj diosal d'ayin, ay velk'och d'a yol sat. A mach tzin k'anab'ajani, ol in colcaneli, xchi Dios.
